title.rendered: Easter Egg Hunt + Good Friday Hours

content.rendered:
Easter Egg Hunt

Join us in Macon and Warner Robins on Saturday, 4/15, at 10:00 a.m. for our annual Easter Egg Hunt! We will hide more than 1,000 eggs in the two stores!
Eggs will be filled with candy or vouchers for free books, toys, and other prizes. Please arrive by 10:00 sharp. Admission is free.

 

Easter Gifts

Fill up your Easter basket with toys, books, and other gifts from Gottwals Books. Crazy Aaron’s Thinking Putty® and Melissa & Doug® kickballs are sure to delight, or pick up a copy of The Littlest Bunny in Georgia or another Easter-themed book for some family reading. You can’t go wrong with a Gottwals Books gift card!

 

Closed Good Friday

We will be closed on Good Friday to recognize the sacrifice of Jesus Christ on the cross. Regular business hours will resume Saturday, April 16th.
